messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Hi, I'm calling about my mother Susan Park.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: No, my name is Linda Park. I'm calling about my mother, Susan Park.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Got it, Linda. Can I help with Susan Parks' care today?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Yes, I'd like to know what medications she's currently on.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Understood. For privacy, I'll need to verify Susan's identity. Can you please provide her date of birth?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Sure, her date of birth is March 15, 1945.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thank you. Just to confirm, that's March fifteenth nineteen forty five. Can you also provide Susan's full name as it appears on her records?
